title: Hi, does the Wilmington area have any type of exchange where one can donate gently used medical items such as walkers, crutches or hosptial beds that you no longer need but could benefit someone else?  I saw something like this on the news in another city and wondered if we had something like it here.  Thanks!
text:
New Hanover Regional Medical Center has a program like that. Here's
a link: http://www.nhrmc.org/body.cfm?id=4171
